meanings.definition: A person who is trained in a science and whose job involves doing scientific research or solving scientific problems.
meanings.sent1: The scientists conducted experiments in the laboratory.
meanings.sent2: Many scientists work together to discover new medicines.
meanings.sent3: The scientists accidentally mixed up their test tubes and created a colorful explosion.
meanings.sent4: The scientists are like detectives, uncovering the mysteries of the natural world.
meanings.sent5: The young scientists eagerly observed the stars through their telescope.

meanings.definition: A person who is an expert in one of the sciences.
meanings.sent1: The scientists shared their knowledge at the conference.
meanings.sent2: The world-renowned scientists received awards for their groundbreaking research.
meanings.sent3: The scientists debated whether a tomato is a fruit or a vegetable.
meanings.sent4: The scientists' minds are like libraries filled with scientific facts.
meanings.sent5: The curious scientists explored the depths of the ocean to study marine life.
